==Career==

== Career ==
â
Released in early August 2010 by the studio Freaky Empire, the [[gonzo]] porn film ''Phattys Rhymes & Dimes 14'' features an almost hour-long scene between Fishburne and porn actor [[Brian Pumper]].<ref name=AVNMore>{{cite web | title = More Montana Fishburne Footage Surfaces| author=Steve Javors | publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/More-Montana-Fishburne-Footage-Surfaces-405558.html | date =2010-07-30 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> She performs with Pumper again in the film ''[[Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut]]'', scheduled for release on August 18, 2010 by [[Vivid Entertainment]].<ref name="nydn" /> The film is over an hour long and features her in a car, a hotel room and a mall.<ref name=AVNFlick>{{cite web | title =Laurenceâs Daughter, Montana Fishburne, Stars in XXX Flick for Vivid | publisher =AVN.com | url =http://business.avn.com/articles/Larry-s-Daughter-Montana-Fishburne-Stars-in-XXX-Flick-for-Vivid-405471.html | date = 2010-07-30| accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> Commenting on why she decided to make the film, she said "I view making this movie as an important first step in my career ... I've watched how successful [[Kim Kardashian]] became and I think a lot of it was due to the release of her sex tape by Vivid."<ref name=AVNFlick/> Fishburne says she is in talks with Vivid about making another film.<ref name=AVNSpeaks>{{cite web | title = AVN Exclusive: Montana Fishburne Speaks| author=Peter Warren| publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/AVN-Exclusive-Montana-Fishburne-Speaks-406615.html | date =2010-08-06 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref>

She performs with Pumper again in the film ''[[Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut]]'', scheduled for release on August 18, 2010 by [[Vivid Entertainment]].<ref name="nydn" /> The film is over an hour long and features her in a car, a hotel room and a mall.<ref name=AVNFlick>{{cite web | title =Laurenceâs Daughter, Montana Fishburne, Stars in XXX Flick for Vivid | publisher =AVN.com | url =http://business.avn.com/articles/Larry-s-Daughter-Montana-Fishburne-Stars-in-XXX-Flick-for-Vivid-405471.html | date = 2010-07-30| accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> Commenting on why she decided to make the film, she said "I view making this movie as an important first step in my career ... I've watched how successful [[Kim Kardashian]] became and I think a lot of it was due to the release of her sex tape by Vivid."<ref name=AVNFlick/> Fishburne says she is in talks with Vivid about making another film.<ref name=AVNSpeaks>{{cite web | title = AVN Exclusive: Montana Fishburne Speaks| author=Peter Warren| publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/AVN-Exclusive-Montana-Fishburne-Speaks-406615.html | date =2010-08-06 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref>
She revealed that her father is "very hurt" about her porn career, but she believes he will eventually view it as a positive.<ref name=nydn2/>
